definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

sentences.english: But in fact, the very concept of species has fueled debates for decades.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上，物種絕對觀念的爭辯已經延燒了數十年。
